comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.nj.com/advice/2024/06/miss-manners-relatives-gifts-always-come-with-insults-attached.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nj.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F06%2Fmiss-manners-relatives-gifts-always-come-with-insults-attached.html) ### Comment > The problem has changed since you had me enabled the annoyance filters on ticket number 182340. The page displays normally with the annoyance filters enabled if I type the website (nj.com) manually into the Chrome address bar and then search for the article. If I click a link in the Google Discover feed, which is where I usually find the articles I'm trying to read, instead of getting the popup I had been seeing saying that an ad locker had been detected, I'm now getting a blank white screen. It's blank in the Google app and when I try to open the link in Chrome. If I disable the annoyance filters and click the link, I go back to seeing the notice the ad locker has been detected on both the Google app and Chrome browser. Since this is also the case for ticket 182157 (I just made a new report on that ticket), I'm assuming it is the same for tickets 182340, 182176 and 181350 as well. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gabz3eoeruo04okkkc8skksssskk400cu68si2vnag.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.5 System version: | Android 14 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,

issue.title: www-mlive-com.cdn.ampproject.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www-mlive-com.cdn.ampproject.org/v/s/www.mlive.com/advice/2024/06/dear-abby-woman-wants-to-end-friendship-with-entitled-manipulative-friend.html?amp_js_v=a9#amp_tf=From%20%251%24s&aoh=17196212759689&csi=0&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-mlive-com.cdn.ampproject.org%2Fv%2Fs%2Fwww.mlive.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F06%2Fdear-abby-woman-wants-to-end-friendship-with-entitled-manipulative-friend.html%3Famp_js_v%3Da9%23amp_tf%3DFrom%2520%25251%2524s%26aoh%3D17196212759689%26csi%3D0%26referrer%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.google.com) ### Comment > I had been getting a popup saying ad blocker detected. Same problem with multiple websites. On tkt 182340 for same issue on another website, you told me to enable the annoyance filters. Now I'm getting blank white screens instead of the pop-up. This is happening in Google app and on chrome browser. Link I tried to open was from Google Discover feed, as all have been. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gabz3eoeruo04okkkc8skksssskk400cu68si2vnag.jpg?nc=1)
